techmeme.title: CoreWeave denies an FT report that Microsoft withdrew from some of its agreements ahead of CoreWeave's IPO, saying "there have been no contract cancellations" (Angela Christy/Reuters)
Sam Altman's World Network unveils World Chat, a "mini app" in the World App wallet for messaging and sending and receiving crypto, in beta on Android and iOS (Margaux Nijkerk/CoinDesk)
Trump signs an EO to establish a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and a Digital Asset Stockpile using BTC and other digital assets forfeited in criminal or civil cases (Jesse Coghlan/Cointelegraph)
A Brazilian judge gives Apple 90 days to allow sideloading on iOS in Brazil, saying the "limitations" imposed by Apple on developers could deter new competitors (Filipe Espósito/9to5Mac)
DoubleZero, which is coordinating a global network of fiber optic cables to improve blockchains, raised $28M in a token round, sources say at a $400M valuation (Danny Nelson/CoinDesk)
